description:
Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En avant, le Corbeau ! Droit sur l`autel sacrificiel
Il tempio divino e la foresta del Supremo
Onward, Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar!
Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no Saidan o Mezase
Полный вперёд, Коросумару! На пути к жертвенному алтарю
تقدّم أيّها الغراب، إلى المذبح القرباني
ไปเลยการาสุมารุ! มุ่งสู่แท่นบูชายัญ
すすめカラス丸! 生贄の祭壇を目指せ
